::Killfest::

Killfest follows DrillBit, butting away his EMP rifle. He looks the 
Destrons over as he passes them, not too impressed.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Do we go with you?" Neody asks Ramjet, not knowing any of the 
procedures in these situations.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Scourge/Hun-Grr/Ramjet:::
> 
> Scourge: Hey, hey, take it easy. I was just asking your name. My 
names 
> Scourge, whats yours?
> ~~~~~
> ::Hun-Grr is tired of trying to keep his team from fighting, so he 
just sits 
> down and watches Rippersnapper and Sinnertwin::
> ~~~~~
> ::Ramjet nods::
> Ramjet: Allow me to introduce my team:  These are my gestalt 
partners, Dirge 
> and Skywarp, the two jets are Falcon and Snare, the strange looking 
one is 
> Like-Like, my right hand man and tactical advisor is Cygnar, and 
the last one 
> is Neody.  I think Cygnar and i should discuss with you.  May we 
start now?
